meanings.definition: Showing sincere and enthusiastic support or approval.
meanings.sent1: She gave the heartiest cheer for her friend's performance.
meanings.sent2: The team received the heartiest congratulations for their victory.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail in the heartiest approval of the treat.
meanings.sent4: His heartiest handshake conveyed his genuine support.
meanings.sent5: The heartiest smile on her face showed her true enthusiasm.

meanings.sent1: The heartiest welcome was extended to the new neighbors.
meanings.sent2: She always had the heartiest greetings for everyone she met.
meanings.sent3: The heartiest hug from the teddy bear made the child feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The heartiest fireplace in the house kept them warm all winter.
meanings.sent5: The heartiest laughter filled the room with joy and warmth.

meanings.sent1: He gave the heartiest effort in the race and won first place.
meanings.sent2: The heartiest applause erupted from the audience at the end of the show.
meanings.sent3: The heartiest dance moves at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her heartiest singing voice filled the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The heartiest high-five between friends showed their excitement.
